#labels Featured
= Supported OS =
Developed under Fedora
But in theory everywhere you have htmlcxx, icu, google-url and boost - you have whalebot 

= Dependencies =
 * [http://htmlcxx.sourceforge.net/ htmlcxx v 0.84]
 * [http://www.boost.org/ boost] now used asio, program options, filesystem, algorithm string, unordered map, thread, date_time and other
 * custom libs in svn
 * google-url in svn depends on [http://site.icu-project.org/ icu] 

= Build system =
In [http://code.google.com/p/whalebot/source/browse/#svn/tags/release-0.01.00 release-0.01.00] moved to [http://cmake.org/ cmake]

to build
{{{
cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release .
make
sudo make install
}}}

= Start-crawl =

{{{
whalebot -s http://google.com -O ~/web
}}}

 # Wait for some time
 # Wait again
 # ...
 # *THE WHOLE INTERNET* on your hard drive :)

For more accurate parameters tuning see CommandLineParameters
